destination.name: Geoje Island
destination.description: An island known for its beautiful coastline, shipbuilding industry, and the historic Oedo-Botania botanical garden.

destination.name: Pocheon
destination.description: A city surrounded by mountains and lakes, Pocheon is famous for its scenic landscapes, temples, and the Herb Island theme park.

destination.name: Buyeo
destination.description: A city with a rich history, Buyeo is home to historical sites like the Baekje Cultural Land and the Neungsa Temple.

destination.name: Iksan
destination.description: Known for its agricultural heritage and historical relics, Iksan features the Mireuksa Temple and the Seodong Park.

destination.name: Namwon
destination.description: A city with a romantic atmosphere, Namwon is famous for its scenic gardens, traditional architecture, and the Chunhyang Theme Park.

destination.name: Yeongju
destination.description: Located near Mount Sobaeksan, Yeongju is known for its historic Buseoksa Temple, ancient relics, and the Sobaeksan National Park.

destination.name: Pyeongchang
destination.description: Host of the 2018 Winter Olympics, Pyeongchang is a mountainous region known for its ski resorts, Alpensia Resort, and scenic beauty.

destination.name: Jinhae
destination.description: Famous for its cherry blossom festival, Jinhae is a picturesque coastal city with parks, naval attractions, and historic sites.

destination.name: Gochang
destination.description: Known for the UNESCO World Heritage site of Dolmen Sites, Gochang offers a blend of natural beauty and cultural heritage.

destination.name: Gapyeong
destination.description: A region surrounded by mountains and rivers, Gapyeong is famous for its natural attractions, Nami Island, and the Garden of Morning Calm.

destination.name: Uijeongbu
destination.description: A city surrounded by mountains, Uijeongbu is known for its lively markets, the Uijeongbu Budaejjigae Street, and the Haengjusanseong Fortress.

destination.name: Jeungpyeong
destination.description: A county with rural charm, Jeungpyeong features the Chungbuk Cheongju Airport, the Geumsusanseong Fortress, and the Geumsusan Mountain.

destination.name: Goesan
destination.description: Surrounded by mountains and agricultural landscapes, Goesan is known for the picturesque Sobaeksan Mountain and the Seonunsa Temple.

destination.name: Hongcheon
destination.description: A county with natural beauty, Hongcheon features the Vivaldi Park Ski World, the Palbongsan Mountain, and the Hongcheon River.

destination.name: Yeoju
destination.description: Known for its ceramics and history, Yeoju features the Yeoju Premium Outlets, the Silleuksa Temple, and the Yangji Pine Resort.

destination.name: Uiwang
destination.description: A city with a mix of industry and culture, Uiwang features the Uiwang Railroad Village, the Cheonggyesan Mountain, and the Everland Resort.

destination.name: Chungju
destination.description: Situated by Chungju Lake, Chungju features the Danyangho Lake, the Jungangtap Munhwa Street, and the Sangdangsanseong Fortress.

destination.name: Hamyang
destination.description: A county known for its scenic beauty, Hamyang features the Dalmasa Temple, the Sancheong Medicinal Herb Theme Park, and the Jirisan National Park.

destination.name: Asan
destination.description: Famous for its hot springs and health resorts, Asan is a relaxing destination with a mix of nature and wellness activities.

destination.name: Ganghwa Island
destination.description: An island with historical sites, Ganghwa features the Ganghwa Dolmen Sites, the Ganghwa Peace Observatory, and the Bomunsa Temple.

destination.name: Namhae
destination.description: A coastal town known for its stunning landscapes, Namhae features the Namhae German Village, the Boriam Temple, and the Sangju Beach.

destination.name: Yeongdeok
destination.description: A coastal city with seafood delights, Yeongdeok features the Yeongdeok Blue Road, the Jukdobong Park, and the Gosu Cave.

destination.name: Buan
destination.description: Known for its scenic countryside, Buan features the Byeonsanbando National Park, the Gyeongpo Beach, and the Byeonsan Peninsula.

destination.name: Seosan
destination.description: A city with a mix of history and coastal charm, Seosan features the Taeanhaean National Park, the Sorae Fish Market, and the Haemi Fortress.

destination.name: Yeongju
destination.description: Located near Mount Sobaeksan, Yeongju is known for its historic Buseoksa Temple, ancient relics, and the Sobaeksan National Park.

destination.name: Boryeong
destination.description: Famous for its mud festival, Boryeong features the Daecheon Beach, the Boryeong Fish Market, and the Geumgang Lake.

destination.name: Seosan
destination.description: A coastal city with historical sites, Seosan features the Haemi Martyrdom Holy Ground, the Mallipo Beach, and the Haemi Traditional Culture Village.
